name: Sapphire Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 feet walking, 15 feet burrowing, 60 feet flying
description: The Sapphire Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon distinguished by its psionic abilities and physical prowess. It features a sleek body and sharp teeth for a powerful bite.
memorable: The ability to observe creatures psionically from 100 miles away makes this dragon a unique reconnaissance threat.
goals: Typically engages in combat to defeat foes and may use its psionic observation for strategic advantages.
relations: Related to other dragons, particularly sapphire dragons, and may serve or ally with creatures possessing psionic abilities.
environment: Often found in mountainous or cavernous regions where it can use its burrowing and flying capabilities.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage and fatigue conditions, along with strong physical and mental stats.
weaknesses: Limited defenses against other damage types as it doesn't have damage resistance beyond psychic immunity.
attacks: The creature can attack with a vicious bite and unleash a deadly psychic breath weapon causing area damage.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Far Thoughts' ability allows it to psionically observe familiar creatures from up to 100 miles away.
senses: It has a passive perception of 14, which allows it to notice hidden creatures with ease.
skills: Possesses high skill proficiencies in arcana, history, insight, and perception, showcasing its intellectual capabilities.
additional_information: Has telepathy within 120 feet, enhancing its communication in combat.
Can recharge its area attack, 'Discognitive Breath,' making it a consistent threat.
Possesses a high level of mobility with the ability to fly and burrow.
test_queries: wyrmling that can see 100 miles away
sapphire dragon with strong arcana skills
